statements: SELECT * FROM image_similarity_scores;
SELECT image_id, similarity_score FROM image_similarity_scores;
SELECT similarity_score, image_id FROM image_similarity_scores;
SELECT * FROM image_similarity_scores WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM image_similarity_scores WHERE similarity_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM image_similarity_scores ORDER BY similarity_score DESC;
SELECT image_id, similarity_score FROM image_similarity_scores WHERE similarity_score > 0.5 ORDER BY similarity_score ASC;
SELECT image_id, AVG(similarity_score) AS average_score FROM image_similarity_scores GROUP BY image_id;
SELECT image_id, COUNT(*) AS num_of_scores FROM image_similarity_scores GROUP BY image_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT image_id, similarity_score FROM image_similarity_scores WHERE image_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY similarity_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM ImageSimilarityScores WHERE similarity_score > 0.5
SELECT image_id, similarity_score FROM ImageSimilarityScores ORDER BY similarity_score DESC
SELECT AVG(similarity_score) FROM ImageSimilarityScores
SELECT image_id, similarity_score FROM ImageSimilarityScores WHERE image_id = 10
SELECT cluster_id, COUNT(cluster_label) FROM ClusteringResults GROUP BY cluster_id
SELECT * FROM ImageSimilarityScores ORDER BY similarity_score DESC
SELECT image_id, AVG(similarity_score) AS avg_score FROM ImageSimilarityScores GROUP BY image_id HAVING avg_score > 0.5 ORDER BY avg_score DESC
SELECT cluster_id, COUNT(*) AS num_images FROM ClusteringResults GROUP BY cluster_id HAVING num_images > 5 ORDER BY num_images DESC
SELECT TOP 3 * FROM ClusteringResults WHERE cluster_label LIKE '%car%'
SELECT * FROM ImageSimilarityScores WHERE similarity_score BETWEEN 0.5 AND 0.8 ORDER BY image_id ASC
SELECT * FROM image_similarity_scores ORDER BY similarity_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT image_id, similarity_score FROM image_similarity_scores WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT image_id, similarity_score FROM image_similarity_scores WHERE similarity_score > 0.8;
SELECT cluster_id, image_ids FROM clustering_results ORDER BY cluster_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT image_id, feature_vector FROM image_features;
SELECT image_id, similarity_score FROM image_similarity_scores WHERE similarity_score > 0.8 ORDER BY similarity_score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT cluster_id, image_ids FROM clustering_results WHERE cluster_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY cluster_id;
SELECT image_id, feature_vector FROM image_features WHERE image_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM clustering_results WHERE ARRAY_LENGTH(image_ids, 1) > 5;
SELECT image_id, similarity_score FROM image_similarity_scores WHERE similarity_score > 0.5 ORDER BY image_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ImageMetadata;
SELECT image_id, image_name FROM ImageMetadata ORDER BY image_name ASC;
SELECT image_id, image_path FROM ImageMetadata WHERE image_size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM SimilarityScores WHERE similarity_score > 0.8 ORDER BY similarity_score DESC;

SELECT ClusterResults.cluster_name, ImageMetadata.image_name FROM ClusterResults INNER JOIN ImageClusterMapping ON ClusterResults.cluster_id = ImageClusterMapping.cluster_id INNER JOIN ImageMetadata ON ImageClusterMapping.image_id = ImageMetadata.image_id ORDER BY ClusterResults.cluster_name ASC, ImageMetadata.image_name DESC;
SELECT image_name, image_path FROM ImageMetadata WHERE image_size > 1000;
SELECT image_name, image_path FROM ImageMetadata WHERE image_size < 500;

SELECT image_name, image_size, cluster_name FROM ImageMetadata JOIN ImageClusterMapping ON ImageMetadata.image_id = ImageClusterMapping.image_id JOIN ClusterResults ON ImageClusterMapping.cluster_id = ClusterResults.cluster_id;
SELECT image_name, image_path FROM ImageMetadata WHERE image_size BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY image_name DESC;

SELECT image_name, cluster_name, similarity_score FROM ImageMetadata JOIN ImageClusterMapping ON ImageMetadata.image_id = ImageClusterMapping.image_id JOIN ClusterResults ON ImageClusterMapping.cluster_id = ClusterResults.cluster_id JOIN SimilarityScores ON ImageMetadata.image_id = SimilarityScores.image1_id;
SELECT image_id, feature_vector, feature_type FROM ImageFeatures WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT image_id, feature_type FROM ImageFeatures WHERE image_id = 2;
SELECT image_id, feature_vector FROM ImageFeatures WHERE feature_type = 'Color';
SELECT image_id, feature_vector, feature_type FROM ImageFeatures WHERE feature_vector[1] > 0.5;
SELECT image_id, feature_type FROM ImageFeatures ORDER BY image_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ImageFeatures WHERE feature_type = 'Color'
SELECT image_id, feature_type FROM ImageFeatures WHERE image_id = 100
SELECT image_id, similarity_score FROM ImageSimilarityScores ORDER BY similarity_score DESC
SELECT image_name, image_path FROM ImageMetadata WHERE image_size > 1000
SELECT cluster_id, image_ids FROM ClusteringResults WHERE cluster_id IN (1, 2, 3)
